abstract: In Tokyo, Andy Murray defeats Rafael Nadal in singles, and then teams with his brother Jamie to win the doubles title.
snippet: In Tokyo, Andy Murray defeats Rafael Nadal in singles, and then teams with his brother Jamie to win the doubles title.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray became the first player in 2011 to win both the singles and doubles titles at an A.T.P. tournament, taking the singles title on his own and pairing with his older brother Jamie to win the doubles at the Rakuten Japan Open Tennis Championships in Tokyo.

headline.main: Andy Murray Completes Rare Double in Tokyo
